title: What Metallica song has the lyrics 'what they been saying must be true'? - Quora

response.answer_text: That’s a lyric from the song “Hair of the Dog” by Nazareth from their album of the same name released in 1975. The song was covered by Guns N’ Roses for their cover album The Spaghetti Incident? in 1993. Nazareth version:  Guns N’ Roses version:  The line comes in the first stanza: Heartbreaker, soul shakerI've been told about youSteamroller, midnight shoulderWhat they been saying' must be true It doesn’t sound like any Metallica lyric I’ve heard, though I’m not familiar with any of their stuff post Load. But it’s likely you’ve somehow mistaken the Nazareth song for a Metallica song.
